channel.title: Homes on Nathan Broadbent
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Nathan Broadbent

item.title: about
item.description: Hello! I’m a software developer. I enjoy building web apps with Rails, React, and Node.js. I also build mobile apps with React Native, including native code in Swift, Objective C, Java, and C#. I enjoy working with DevOps, and have experience with AWS, Terraform, Chef, Ansible, Docker, and Kubernetes. I qualified for an O-1 visa, and passed the Toptal screening process. I may be available to work on your project. Please contact me for availability and rates.
